answer:
The available documents don't provide specific information about the overall budget allocation for Adult Social Care in London as a whole. However, they do provide details about the City of London's budget for Adult Social Care.

The commissioned spend for Adult Social Care provision within the City of London for the year 2023/24 is estimated to be just over **£3,600,000**. This budget primarily covers services such as Home Care, Rapid Response and Reablement, Direct Payments, and Residential and Nursing care.

For further information on Adult Social Care services in the City of London, you can contact the Adult Social Care Team at 020 7332 1224 or via email at adultsduty@cityoflondon.gov.uk. More details can also be found on their website: [City of London Adult Social Care](https://www.cityoflondon.gov.uk/services/social-care-for-adults/adult-social-care-reform-and-commissioning/the-fair-cost-of-care-and-market-sustainability-plan).
